title: WHY THE FUCK AM I LV 1
body: My pc turned of i came back on the next day it had a download so i did it and when i logged on my account was lv 1 were are my lv7 champs

replies.body: Indeed this account appears to be level 1, with a tutorial and two matches played a while back.  It's likely that you might be logigng into the wrong account or region.  You can use our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to help retrieve the right one!  If you run into any trouble, though, just hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account recovery team will help.  Hope that helps!
ye i was on the wrong region
